alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:12PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bonner, northern Kootenai and northeastern Spokane Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 312 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Athol, or 18 miles northeast of Hayden, moving west at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hayden, Rathdrum, Dalton Gardens, Spirit Lake, Athol, Hayden Lake, Chilco, Laclede, Bayview, Careywood, and Blanchard. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 435 and 457. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
